definitions.definition: a piece of furniture for sleep or rest, typically a framework with a mattress and coverings.
synonyms: the hay "she got into her bed"

definitions.definition: a place or article used by a person or animal for sleep or rest.
the time for sleeping.
examples: a glass of milk before bed

definitions.definition: a bed and associated facilities making up a place for a patient in a hospital or for a guest at a hotel.
examples: a round of hospital staff layoffs and bed closings

definitions.definition: used with reference to a bed as the typical place for sexual activity.
examples: some men care very little about pleasing their partners in bed

definitions.definition: an area of ground, typically in a garden, where flowers and plants are grown.
a flat base or foundation on which something rests or is supported, in particular.
examples: base, foundation, support, prop, substructure, substratum built on a bed of stones

definitions.definition: the foundation of a road or railroad.
the open part of a truck, wagon, or railroad car, where goods are carried.
the flat surface beneath the baize of a billiard table.
a layer or pile of something, in particular.
a layer of food on which other foods are served.
examples: the salad is served on a bed of raw spinach

definitions.definition: a layer of rock or other geological material.
any mass or pile resembling a bed.
examples: pots steaming on the fragrant bed of coals

definitions.definition: the bottom of the sea or a lake or river.
a place on the seabed where shellfish, especially oysters or mussels, breed or are bred.
settle down to sleep or rest for the night, typically in an improvised place.
examples: he usually bedded down on newspapers in the church porch

definitions.definition: settle a person or animal down to sleep or rest for the night.
have sexual intercourse with.
examples: he should bed a woman his own age

definitions.definition: transfer (a plant) from a pot or seed tray to a garden plot.
fix firmly; embed.
examples: the posts should be firmly bedded in concrete

definitions.definition: lay or arrange (something, especially stone) in a layer.
